# This file is autogenerated
title: createSmartWalletClient
description: Overview of the createSmartWalletClient method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/wallet-apis/functions/createSmartWalletClient
---

Creates a smart wallet client with wallet API actions.

## Import

```ts
import { createSmartWalletClient } from "@alchemy/wallet-apis";
```

## Parameters

### params

`CreateSmartWalletClientParams`

- Parameters for creating the smart wallet client.

### params.account

`LocalAccount | JsonRpcAccount`

- The account to use for signing.

### params.transport

`AlchemyTransport`

- The transport to use for RPC calls.

### params.chain

`Chain`

- The blockchain network to connect to.

### params.policyIds

`string[]`

- Optional policy IDs for paymaster service.

## Returns

`WalletClient`
A wallet client extended with smart wallet actions.
